title: The words you choose within an app are an essential part of its user experience
dot:
digraph UX_Writing{graph[layout=dot, splines=true, rankdir=TB, fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=12];node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10];edge[fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10];subgraph cluster_main{label="UX Writing Guidelines";style=filled;color=lightyellow;Voice[label="Determine your app’s voice
• Reflect app values
• Consistent language"];Tone[label="Match your tone to context
• Adapt to user actions
• Example: Fall Detection vs Move Streak"];Clarity[label="Be clear
• Use simple, concise language
• Avoid unnecessary words"];Accessibility[label="Write for everyone
• Use plain language
• Avoid jargon, gendered terms"];ScreenPurpose[label="Consider each screen's purpose
• Prioritize information
• Break ideas across screens"];ActionOriented[label="Be action oriented
• Use active voice
• Clear, descriptive labels"];LanguagePatterns[label="Build language patterns
• Title/sentence case
• Consistent person (1st/2nd)"];DeviceSpecific[label="Write for each device
• Adjust for screen size & gestures
• Address different contexts"];BlankScreens[label="Provide clear next steps
• Guide actions on empty states
• Showcase app voice"];Errors[label="Write clear error messages
• Avoid blame
• Offer solutions, not problems"];DeliveryMethod[label="Choose delivery method
• Tailor urgency & tone
• Notifications, alerts, etc."];Settings[label="Keep settings labels simple
• Describe functionality clearly
• Offer direct links"];TextFields[label="Show hints in text fields
• Provide examples
• Place errors close to inputs"];Voice->Tone;Tone->Clarity;Clarity->Accessibility;Accessibility->ScreenPurpose;ScreenPurpose->ActionOriented;ActionOriented->LanguagePatterns;LanguagePatterns->DeviceSpecific;DeviceSpecific->BlankScreens;BlankScreens->Errors;Errors->DeliveryMethod;DeliveryMethod->Settings;Settings->TextFields;}Resources[label="Resources
• Apple Style Guide
• Writing Inclusively
• Accessibility
• Color", shape=note, color=lightblue, style=filled];Videos[label="Videos & Change Log
• Related tutorials
• Updates on UX writing", shape=note, color=lightblue, style=filled];cluster_main->Resources[label="Reference"];cluster_main->Videos[label="Learn more"];}
